title: Game now freezes my computer upon starting a match
body:
Went to play a game, got into it, one second in a loud sound, computer freezes, forced restart. Teammates have already remade so I get a leaver penalty.
I assume its a weird coincidence so I try again. Loud sound, computer freezes, forced restart. Remake and leaver penalty AGAIN.
Finally, I try a custom. Guess what? Loud sound, computer freezes, forced restart. 
I have no idea why this is happening but I literally cannot play the game. I used to be able to play it fine at 60+ FPS and have had no issues prior to this. I suspect it may be the new Windows Updates or a patch however, and I'm loathe to reinstall as the process is long and cumbersome.

replies.body:
This sounds like the known issue with the Windows Game Bar after it was updated to include *Game DVR*. I recommend [disabling this feature entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this problem.

Let me know if it did!
